DOC.brief_summary: Estimate the prevalence of self-reported osteoarthritis and its characterization in adults over 45 years of age: - Characterization of self-reported patients with OA (socio-demographic, comorbidities, VAS for intensity of pain) - Characterization of OA diagnosis in patients with self-reported OA - Impact of self-reported OA in the working abilities, quality of life and functionality (SF-12 v2.0) - Characterization of treatment approaches (therapeutic and non-therapeutic) for self-reported patients with OA - Patient perception of impact of OA in its life and importance given to disease
